name: Myrrh
insights: Myrrh is the only hero with Spirit Breath.
Myrrh is the only hero with Def Res 2.
Myrrh is the only hero with Def Res 1.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Breath heroes.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Breath heroes.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Attack">ATK</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.
Myrrh has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.
description: A manakete who is much older than her appearance suggests. She'd like some candy but is a little shy about asking for it. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

dialogue.text: Trick or treat! I'm Myrrh! Are you going to the harvest festival too?
I've got this costume, pumpkins line every street, and there's candy as far as the eye can see... I think this festival will be fun.
I lived with my father in Darkling Woods for a very long time, so I've never seen such a lively festival.
I hear you're supposed to play a trick on someone if they don't give you treats, but... Oh, I could never do anything so mean to someone. I guess it's OK if I don't get any treats...
There's no candy where I lived in Darkling Woods... And now I've definitely eaten too much.
I dreamt a pumpkin monster was chasing me! It was so scary...and now I can't get back to sleep.
Trick or treat! Hehe. I brought you a big harvest-festival greeting from <Friend Name>!
So much candy... I'm so happy!
I bet I could do a good job at scaring people...if I became a dragon!
Sorry... Guess I didn't do it right.
Om nom nom! Thish candy ish deelishush!

I've been alive for so long...but this is the first time I've experienced such a fun festival. Everyone's laughing and dancing. They're all handing out candy... And, well, there are some scary monsters wandering around, but still, I'm having so much fun! Even though I think all the people I've met here will be gone in a thousand years... I won't forget any of them. Even after a thousand years...and then another thousand! I'll remember this festival and the time I spent with everyone. Trick or treat! I'd never even heard this phrase before coming here, but it'll remind me of all the fun I had.
